txt.en: Lost Temple: The Sick and the Dead

The sellswords foolish enough to follow Ferndúr into the depths of the Lost Temple have succumbed to disease or have been slaughtered by the Gaunt-lord himself. Now spirits of plague have possessed their corpses and stalk the crypts, preparing to unleash pestilence and death upon the North.\n\nYou must destroy as many of them as you can before they escape to spread Ferndúr's deadly plague.
Defeat wights within the crypts of the Lost Temple
Discover the entrance to the Lost Temple
To earn this deed, you must defeat many of the wights who stalk the crypts beneath the Lost Temple.
You have defeated many wights within the crypts of the Lost Temple.
